Salmon.ingredients: 1 ½ pounds skin-on salmon fillet, 8 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 2 tablespoons jerk seasoning plus 1 teaspoon, 1 teaspoon paprika, 4 teaspoons lime juice plus lime wedges for serving, 1 pound Brussels sprouts, ¾ teaspoon kosher salt, ¼ teaspoon ground pepper, 1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes, 1 large shallot, minced, 2 cups low-sodium vegetable broth, plus more if needed, 1 cup quinoa, ¼ cup mango juice or nectar, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, ¾ cup dried cranberries, coarsely chopped

Ramen.ingredients: 0.5 leek, cleaned, cut into 2cm wide strips, 0.25 tbsp rapeseed oil, 2 cloves garlic, 0.5 tsp grated ginger, 250 ml chicken stock, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 0.5 tbsp Chinese chilli oil, 1 boneless, skinless chicken breast, 1 egg, 60 g wholewheat dry egg noodles, 22.5 g Peanut Butter, 1 bok choy, quartered, 30 ml soy milk or semi-skimmed milk, spring onions, thinly sliced

CuttingProteinShake.ingredients: 1 cup of milk, 1 cup of frozen berries, 1 scoop of protein powder

SpicyAvocadoSourdoughToastandEggs.ingredients: 2 slices of Ezekiel whole grain bread, 1 egg, 1/2 cup egg whites, Half an avocado, Hot sauce of your choice, Red pepper flakes, to taste

ChickpeaAndQuinoaBowl.ingredients: 1 jar roasted red peppers, ¼ cup slivered almonds, 4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, 1 small clove garlic, 1 teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon ground cumin, ¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper, 2 cups cooked quinoa, ¼ cup Kalamata olives, chopped, ¼ cup finely chopped red onion, 1 can chickpeas, rinsed, 1 cup diced cucumber, ¼ cup crumbled feta cheese, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley

Tostadas.ingredients: 2 corn tortillas, ½ cup canned black beans, 2 tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese, 2 teaspoons freshly squeezed lime juice, 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil, 2 cups mixed salad greens, ¼ avocado, 2 tablespoons pico de gallo or salsa

Gnocchi.ingredients: ½ cup sliced oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes plus 2 tablespoons oil from the jar, 1 (16 ounce) package shelf-stable gnocchi, 1 (15 ounce) can low-sodium cannellini beans, 1 (5 ounce) package baby spinach, 1 large shallot, ⅓ cup low-sodium no-chicken broth or chicken broth, ⅓ cup heavy cream, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, ¼ teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon ground pepper, 3 tablespoons fresh basil leaves

Soup.ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1 medium onion, 2 medium carrots, 2 stalks celery, 12 ounces fresh green beans, 2 cloves garlic, 8 cups no-salt-added chicken broth or low-sodium vegetable broth, 2 (15 ounce) cans low-sodium cannellini or other white beans, 4 cups chopped kale, 2 medium zucchini, 4 Roma tomatoes, 2 teaspoons red-wine vinegar, ¾ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon ground pepper, 8 teaspoons prepared pesto

Casserole.ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes (3 cups), 2 tablespoons ground cumin, 1/2-1 teaspoon ground chipotle chile powder, ¼ teaspoon salt, 8 corn tortillas, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, 1 cup chopped Meal-Prep Sheet-Pan Chicken Thighs, 2 cups Sautéed Peppers & Onions, 1 ½ cups shredded Mexican cheese blend
